input.sentences: my boyfriend and i went to the beach .
we wanted to go down to explore the lighthouse .
we decided it was too far of a walk to get to the lighthouse so we took pictures from a distance .
we climbed further up the hill and enjoyed the view .
output.sentences: the beach was away a reminder of what she had been
a photo a reminder of her last trip with him
he gazed upon the building with tears in his eyes
looking further way walking with no suprise left
air and whispers singing to him "don't forget me love we will be together again"
